sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - முழுக்கு, கழுவு, ஞானஸ்நானம் பெறு, ஞானஸ்நானம் கொடு, ஸ்நானம் பண்ணு, கைகழுவு
1. to dip repeatedly, to immerge, submerge
2. to cleanse by dipping or submerging, to wash, to make clean with water

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From a derivative of G911; to make whelmed (that is, fully wet); used only (in the New Testament) of ceremonial ablution, especially (technically) of the ordinance of Christian baptism: - baptist, baptize, wash.
Cognate: G907, G908, G909, G910, G911
